message:
docs: Add comprehensive end-to-end validation report

- Full codebase analysis for logical correctness
- Identified 12 issues (3 critical, 4 high, 5 medium)
- Migration incomplete: SmsConfigActivity still uses PrefsManager
- Coroutine lifecycle issues: memory leaks in services
- Main thread blocking in SharedPreferences reads
- SQL injection risks, exception swallowing, race conditions
- Health score: 72/100 (Good, needs fixes)
- Prioritized action plan for next 3 phases
- No outdated dependencies found
